itunes:title: Episode 784 - Texas is Back Open, Baby!!!
title: Episode 784 - Texas is Back Open, Baby!!!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Jessie Wiseman celebrate the reopening and de-masking of Texas by getting drunk and breaking down how they think people will react to not having to wear masks anymore, who is already ripping their masks off, and who they...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Jessie Wiseman celebrate the reopening and de-masking of Texas by getting drunk and breaking down how they think people will react to not having to wear masks anymore, who is already ripping their masks off, and who they think will be worried to de-mask too soon — plus we try to get Giorgio some better clothes.
